I/We Agree To Madison RV Resort & Golf Resort's
Privacy Policy
Send Message
445 SW Country Club Road Madison, FL 32340
850-688-0363
Madison RV & Golf Resort FAQ
What are your monthly rates?
Monthly rates can be
found here
and are subject to change without notice.
Is golf included in the price?
Golf is not included in the RV site price.
Golf packages can be added for monthly stays based on availability.
Rates for golf
can be found on the Country Club page.
What time check-in and check-out?
RV Sites:
Check-in time 1pm
Check-out time 11am
Cottages:
Check-in time 3pm
Check-out time 11am
How do I make a reservation?
For current daily and weekly stays, please click the
“Reserve Now”
button.
To book a monthly stay, please
follow this link,
complete the form and a staff member will contact you during business hours.
We
do not
book monthly stays via our reservation system.
Are RV Sites selections guaranteed?
We make every effort to accommodate the RV site selected via our online reservation system. However, we do not guarantee site selection.
Is the Resort pet friendly?
We love dogs at Madison RV & Golf Resort!
We only ask that you be courteous by keeping your pet on a leash and clean up after them.
What is the dress code for the golf course?
We highly encourage collared golf shirts and no denim shorts or jeans.
Where is the nearest grocery store
Winn-Dixie is 1 mile away.
Delivery is available through DoorDash.
Explore Daily, Weekly Rates and Availability

Get 25% Off Daily Rates for 2-6 day stays with code:
STAYCATION
ABOUT OUR RV RESORT
Madison RV and Golf Resort offers the savvy RVer modern conveniences and spacious RV sites, all within a budget-friendly package.
Discover spacious RV sites & modern comforts at unbeatable prices.
Enjoy large RV Sites, essential amenities, & value that will exceed expectations.
About Madison
RV and Golf Resort
Madison FL RV resort features 95 spacious RV sites that are big-rig friendly and include back-in, pull-through and waterfront options. Madison RV and Golf Resort is pet friendly with a 2 acre off leash dog park.
All lots are a spacious 80’ long x 37’ wide with beautiful landscaping for privacy!
Madison RV and Golf Resort located in beautiful North Florida that can also serve as the ideal layover along I-10 for RV travelers. Pet friendly, pool, laundry, clubhouse, showers, clean restrooms with brand new level pull through and back in concrete slab RV sites.
BOOK NOW
RV Sites
When you stay at Madison RV and Golf Resort, we want you to enjoy your stay. We offer 95 spacious sites with easy access for even the largest RVs.
30-50 amp hookups
Water
Sewer hookups
Premium Wi-Fi
Fire Rings
Picnic Tables
RV Sites
When you stay at Madison RV and Golf Resort, we want you to enjoy your stay. We offer 95 spacious sites with easy access for even the largest RVs.
30-50 amp hookups
Water
Sewer hookups
Premium Wi-Fi
Fire Rings
Picnic Tables
Our Cottages
Enjoy our resort – without an RV! We have 3 cottages that can accommodate anywhere from 4 to 8 guests. All cottages are air conditioned, with kitchens, screened porches and fire pits.
Choose from the Palmer, Nicholas or Mickelson!
BOOK NOW
Things to Do
You’ll find plenty of options for biking, hiking, fishing, museums, antiquing, grocery stores, restaurants and an amusement park just a short drive.
Biking
Hiking
Fishing
Museums
Shopping
Much More
Things to Do
You’ll find plenty of options for biking, hiking, fishing, museums, antiquing, grocery stores, restaurants and an amusement park just a short drive.
Biking
Hiking
Fishing
Museums
Shopping
Much More
Pet Friendly RV Resort
At Madison RV and Golf Resort we know that pets are part of the family and that is why we are a pet-friendly facility, so you and your pet can enjoy our 2 acre off leash dog park and everything our RV park has to offer together.
BOOK NOW
Where adventure meets relaxation!
Take a quick tour of our RV and Golf Resort
Join us for a quick 90-second tour of the Madison RV & Golf Resort and see why our guests can’t get enough of it! Explore the spacious RV sites, take a swing on our lush golf course, and cool off in our pristine pool. Don’t forget to test your skills on our pickleball courts and let your furry friend run free in our 2-acre dog park.
